title: St. Sebastian Novena
description: St Sebastian was a martyr in the third century under Diocletian. Pray this novena for soldiers, athletes, difficult trials, and those who desire a holy death.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Glorious Sebastian, martyr and saint, I call on your strength and courage to help me through my difficult trials. Your faith was so deep, a multitude of arrows could not finish you. I ask for your intercession in the trials I face, and for this intention (mention request here‚Ä¶) Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Sebastian, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
